type.name: org.gradle.api.file.ConfigurableFileCollection
type.description:
A ConfigurableFileCollection is a mutable FileCollection.

You can obtain an instance of ConfigurableFileCollection by calling org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)

method.name: builtBy
method.description:
Registers some tasks which build the files of this collection.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

returns:this

method.name: from
method.description:
Adds a set of source paths to this collection. The given paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).
param:paths The files to add.

returns:this

method.name: getBuiltBy
method.description:
Returns the set of tasks which build the files of this collection.

returns:The set. Returns an empty set when there are no such tasks.

method.name: getFrom
method.description:
Returns the set of source paths for this collection. The paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

returns:The set of source paths. Returns an empty set if none.

method.name: setBuiltBy
method.description:
Sets the tasks which build the files of this collection.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

returns:this

method.name: setFrom
method.description:
Sets the source paths for this collection. The given paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).
param:paths The paths.

method.name: setFrom
method.description:
Sets the source paths for this collection. The given paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).
param:paths The paths.

property.name: builtBy
property.description:
Returns the set of tasks which build the files of this collection.

returns:The set. Returns an empty set when there are no such tasks.

property.name: from
property.description:
Returns the set of source paths for this collection. The paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

returns:The set of source paths. Returns an empty set if none.
